ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup prepared basil pesto, divided
4 thin slices prosciutto, or more if needed

cookingTips: Pound chicken breasts to uniform thickness for even cooking
Layer prosciutto and pesto on each breast, then roll and secure with toothpicks
Bake until internal temperature reaches 165°F to ensure food safety while maintaining tenderness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What technique ensures the prosciutto stays crispy while the chicken remains juicy in this elegant preparation?
